main event: A witness in Bayside, Queens observed a small white light moving slowly in the neighborhood, potentially linked to aircraft or an advertising sign.
interesting points: The witness estimated the object's speed to be 30 to 35 mph.,The object was reported to be 1500 to 2000 feet away at the time of sighting.,The object appeared to affect TV signals in the area.,No other civilian reports were recorded for this sighting despite multiple witnesses being from the same location.,The report is part of the historical U.S. Air Force Project Blue Book which collected data on UFO sightings from 1947 to 1969.
sighted object: a small white light in the sky
witness description: A male witness with a history of observing UFOs since childhood expressed interest in the subject and potential involvement in the space program.
